attributes.action: Discuss a vote of no confidence in the UK political system.
attributes.additional_details: Politicians have lost their way in all parties , only in for their own greed and power, we need a system where MPs start working for us.
attributes.background: To remind any of the political parties that they are voted into power to serve the will of the British people

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
